mapper.select: SELECT u.username, us.vmess_uuid vmessUUID,us.shadowsocks_port shadowsocksPort,us.shadowsocks_pass shadowsocksPass,us.begin_time beginTime,us.expire_time expireTime, us.expired expired, us.descript, s.service_name serviceName,s.service_type serviceType,s.price FROM user_service us INNER JOIN users u ON us.user_id = u.id AND u.enabled = 1 INNER JOIN services s ON us.service_id = s.id WHERE us.expired = 0 ORDER BY us.expire_time ASC
